text:
Hi! :wave:
I’m Giusy, a PhD student, and  I’m running a short survey on how AI tools (e.g., code assistants, generative AI) are affecting developers’ workflows and team interactions.
I came across your OSS work and thought your experience could be really valuable. The survey takes about 10–15 minutes, and your input would help a lot with my PhD research.
:point_right: Survey link:
<https://oregonstate.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_3JKz3jwJvUkVIOi>
Thanks a lot for your time, and feel free to share the link with other developers if you’d like! :blush:

attachments.fallback: AI Adoption and Social Patterns in Development Teams
attachments.text:
We are a team of software engineering and Human–AI Collaboration researchers from the Oregon State University (USA) and the University of Salerno (Italy).

Through this survey, we aim to understand how the introduction of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in software development teams influences collaboration and communication. In particular, we are studying how the use of AI tools affects team dynamics and the emergence of social anti-patterns in developer teams.

We are aware that your time is precious. Nevertheless, gathering your opinions—through a systematic research process—is the only way to give them importance and visibility. We would be grateful if you could invest time in completing them.

More information about the survey:

The estimated time of completion of this full survey is 10/15 minutes

We will collect and analyze your answers only in an anonymized form.

Thanks in advance for your effort and time!
attachments.title: AI Adoption and Social Patterns in Development Teams
